title: US says two people killed in military strike on boat in Pacific
desc: Officials say rescuers searching for lone survivor after latest attack on what Pentagon says are suspected drug smugglers

title: Salesforce Cuts Jobs Amid Executive Changes
desc: Salesforce trims staff in marketing, product, and data teams, affecting fewer than 1,000 roles. The company recently had a leadership overhaul.

title: Young couple who loved each other 'beyond words' died together in horror crash
desc: Adam Muskett, 27, and Katie Worrell, 25, from Tenby, were killed in a collision on the A477 in Carmarthenshire - Alexander MacCallum has now pleaded guilty to causing death by careless driving

title: Another vintage bomb found at UP Diliman, morning classes suspended
desc: Another vintage bomb was discovered Tuesday morning at the Institute of Chemistry Teaching Building in University of the Philippines Diliman.

title: Samsung's ultra-affordable tablet is now even better than before
desc: At this price, it's hard to ignore

title: Radar data shows cavernous underground lava tube on Venus
desc: Researchers said radar data gathered on Venus was consistent with a geological feature called a lava tube found in some volcanic locations on Earth and also on the moon.

title: Sarah Discaya, Roma Rimando file bail petition in malversation case -spox
desc: Contractor Sarah Discaya and Roma Rimando of St. Timothy Construction filed a petition for bail in their non-bailable malversation of public funds case, her spokesperson said Tuesday.

title: Africa sits on $29.5tn mineral wealth – AFC Report
desc: A new AFC report reveals Africa's $29.5tn mineral wealth is largely untapped. Learn why better data and infrastructure are key to unlocking its potential.

title: Critical Manpower Shortage, Unsafe Working Conditions At HTAR Klang - Medical Officer
desc: An MO raises dire shortages of HOs and MOs at HTAR Klang's medical department with only 15 HOs and 40 MOs (available as active working manpower). An MO manages 30-35 patients concurrently in wards, 6-7 active on-calls a month, without HO support overnight.

title: Trump news at a glance: Europe must stand up to Trump and his ‘demolition men’, new report says
desc: Report prepared by Munich Security Conference warns of ‘suicide of a superpower’ under Trump – key US politics stories from Monday 9 February at a glance
